attr.title: Terra Flame
attr.desc: Terra Flame is a horizontal shoot ’em up inspired by the 1990s, featuring authentic pixel-art graphics and a chiptune soundtrack created with classic Mega Drive sound sources.”
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all files into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1921840/Terra_Flame/) and copy all game files into the `assets` folder.
